days.title: Connection Audit
days.prompt: List the five most important relationships in your life. For each one, rate the quality of connection on a scale of 1-10. What patterns do you notice?

days.title: Communication Patterns
days.prompt: Reflect on how you communicate in your closest relationships. What habits serve you well? What would you like to improve?

days.title: Gratitude Expression
days.prompt: Choose one important person in your life. What do you appreciate about them that you've never directly expressed? How can you share this with them?
